sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { Container, Typography, Grid, Paper, Box } from '@mui/material';
import { BarChart, Bar, XAxis, YAxis, CartesianGrid, Tooltip, Legend, ResponsiveContainer } from 'recharts';

const JobAnalysisPage = () => {
  const [remoteStats, setRemoteStats] = React.useState([]);
  const [levelStats, setLevelStats] = React.useState([]);

  React.useEffect(() => {
    // Fetch remote work stats
    fetch('http://localhost:8080/jobs/remote-stats')
      .then(res => res.json())
      .then(data => setRemoteStats(data))
      .catch(err => console.error(err));

    // Fetch job level stats
    fetch('http://localhost:8080/jobs/level-stats')
      .then(res => res.json())
      .then(data => setLevelStats(data))
      .catch(err => console.error(err));
  }, []);

  return (
    <Container maxWidth="lg" sx={{ mt: 4 }}>
      <Typography variant="h4" sx={{ mb: 4 }}>
        Job Market Analysis
      </Typography>
      
      <Grid container spacing={3}>
        <Grid item xs={12} md={6}>
          <Paper sx={{ p: 3 }}>
            <Typography variant="h6" gutterBottom>
              Remote Work Analysis
            </Typography>
            <Box sx={{ height: 400 }}>
              <ResponsiveContainer width="100%" height="100%">
                <BarChart data={remoteStats}>
                  <CartesianGrid strokeDasharray="3 3" />
                  <XAxis dataKey="work_arrangement" />
                  <YAxis />
                  <Tooltip />
                  <Legend />
                  <Bar dataKey="total_applications" fill="#2196f3" name="Total Applications" />
                  <Bar dataKey="approval_rate" fill="#4caf50" name="Approval Rate (%)" />
                </BarChart>
              </ResponsiveContainer>
            </Box>
          </Paper>
        </Grid>

        <Grid item xs={12} md={6}>
          <Paper sx={{ p: 3 }}>
            <Typography variant="h6" gutterBottom>
              Job Level Salary Analysis
            </Typography>
            <Box sx={{ height: 400 }}>
              <ResponsiveContainer width="100%" height="100%">
                <BarChart data={levelStats}>
                  <CartesianGrid strokeDasharray="3 3" />
                  <XAxis dataKey="seniority_level" />
                  <YAxis />
                  <Tooltip />
                  <Legend />
                  <Bar dataKey="avg_min_salary" fill="#2196f3" name="Average Min Salary" />
                  <Bar dataKey="avg_max_salary" fill="#4caf50" name="Average Max Salary" />
                </BarChart>
              </ResponsiveContainer>
            </Box>
          </Paper>
        </Grid>
      </Grid>
    </Container>
  );
};

export default JobAnalysisPage;
